an9.3:4.1: * Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā cālikāyaṃ viharati cālikāpabbate.
an9.3:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
an9.3:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an9.3:4.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.3:4.6: “icchāmahaṃ, bhante, jantugāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitun”ti.
an9.3:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an9.3:5.2: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
an9.3:5.3: Addasā kho āyasmā meghiyo kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṃ pāsādikaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
an9.3:5.5: “pāsādikaṃ vatidaṃ ambavanaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ, alaṃ vatidaṃ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
an9.3:5.6: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṃ imaṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
an9.3:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an9.3:6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.3:7.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ.
an9.3:7.2: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃ.
an9.3:7.3: Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṃ pāsādikaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
an9.3:7.7: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṃ imaṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā’ti.
an9.3:7.8: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṃ taṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
an9.3:7.10: Ekakamhi tāva yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
an9.3:8.1: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.3:8.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, natthi katassa paṭicayo.
an9.3:8.3: Mayhaṃ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṃ, atthi katassa paṭicayo.
an9.3:8.4: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṃ taṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
an9.3:8.5: “Āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
an9.3:9.1: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.3:9.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, natthi katassa paṭicayo.
an9.3:9.3: Mayhaṃ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṃ, atthi katassa paṭicayo.
an9.3:9.4: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṃ taṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
an9.3:10.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yena taṃ ambavanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an9.3:10.2: upasaṅkamitvā taṃ ambavanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
an9.3:10.3: Atha kho āyasmato meghiyassa tasmiṃ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṃ—
an9.3:10.7: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā;
an9.3:10.8: atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā—
an9.3:11.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an9.3:11.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.3:12.1: “Idha mayhaṃ, bhante, tasmiṃ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṃ—
an9.3:12.5: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā;
an9.3:12.6: atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā—
an9.3:13.1: “Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripakkāya saṃvattanti.
an9.3:13.3: Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
an9.3:13.4: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ paṭhamo dhammo paripakkāya saṃvattati. (1)
an9.3:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an9.3:14.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ dutiyo dhammo paripakkāya saṃvattati. (2)
an9.3:15.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṃ—
an9.3:15.2: appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā, evarūpiyā kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an9.3:15.3: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ tatiyo dhammo paripakkāya saṃvattati. (3)
an9.3:16.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an9.3:16.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ catuttho dhammo paripakkāya saṃvattati. (4)
an9.3:17.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an9.3:17.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ pañcamo dhammo paripakkāya saṃvattati.
an9.3:18.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa:
an9.3:19.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa:
an9.3:19.4: vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā, evarūpiyā kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī’.
an9.3:20.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa:
an9.3:21.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa:
an9.3:22.1: Tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā—
an9.3:22.2: asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya, mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāya, ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya, aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghātāya.
an9.3:22.4: Anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇāti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānan”ti.
